name: Galvo
text:
—Mhmhm, it's more difficult than I thought.
This "tempering" thing.

Galvo murmured before the newly made chocolate,
which was white and powdery.

name: Galvo
text:
Well, even if this is to be eaten separately...
Alright, let's remake it, Observer!
I seek perfect chocolate!

name: Galvo
text:
...Hm?
Why am I suddenly making chocolate by hand,
you ask?

name: Galvo
text: Observer, culture is something to be experienced.

name: Galvo
text:
Words change form over time.
Even the same words can have different
meanings and intentions as time passes.

name: Galvo
text:
It is the same for culture.
Even if there are similar things in the future or past,
there is no such thing as "exactly the same culture".

name: Galvo
text:
In other words...
if you're going to experience it, put your all into it!
Come on, [Player]! Next, be careful not to let any moisture mix in!!

name: Galvo
text:
...Oh, this!
Isn't this quite well done!
[Player]!

In front of Galvo and [Player] were two chocolate confections,
somewhat misshapen in places, but still got a sparkling sheen.

name: Galvo
text:
My chocolate and your chocolate.
Even though we made them together,
it's difficult to say which is better...

name: Galvo
text:
You were quite enthusiastic about making yours, weren't you?
I was quite surprised myself.

name: Galvo
text:
...Uh, cough, cough.
By the way, I'm a little curious...
To whom do you intend to give that?

name: Galvo
text: Actually... Mine is—

name: Galvo
text:
Hm? What's wrong, pointing the chocolate at me...
You can judge it on the cooking counter too...
What, it's not that?

name: Galvo
text:
—Wait.
You made it to give to me?

name: Galvo
text:
...Ugh...
To be preempted with the same strategy...!
This is the biggest blunder of my life...!!

name: Galvo
text:
To think that revealing my feelings would be
this embarrassing and cause me to be so flustered.

name: Galvo
text:
...I've been reborn countless times, accumulating memories,
and now I am fulfilling my life as "Galvo."

name: Galvo
text:
...However, this is the first time
I've revealed my feelings in this life...
So, I ended up flustered...

name: Galvo
text:
Hehe, but you also needed resolve, didn't you?
It's a fact that I made you bear that burden.

Saying that, Galvo reverently accepted [Player]'s
chocolate confection and brought it to his mouth.

name: Galvo
text:
—Mmm, it's very delicious!
[Player], our chocolate making was a great success!

Even while eating chocolate,
Galvo pulled [Player] onto his lap.

name: Galvo
text:
Alright, be prepared, [Player]!
From now on, I will work hard for your resolve as well!

name: Galvo
text:
First, I will take care of you.
Won't you also try my chocolate?

Galvo slowly scooped up the chocolate confection with his finger.
His fingertip was moving towards [Player]'s mouth.

name: Galvo
text:
Come, let us experience Valentine's.
The meaning of the culture of conveying feelings.
...Memories just for this "Galvo."
